objects.name: credits_2
objects.string:
The Creator of the Pixel Adventure set (GDevelop Asset Store)

The Creator of the RPG Items #2 set (GDevelop Asset Store)

Somepx (somepx.itch.io) for their creation 
of the "Humble Fonts (Free)"

Ansimuz (ansimuz.itch.io) for their creation 
of "Hazy Urban Landscape"

Creator ID 4f6293 of pixelartmaker.com for their creation
of "Background Bathroom HS"

objects.name: text_intro_2
objects.string: ..and he's very excited that you decided to play with him!

objects.name: text_intro_3
objects.string:
Unfortunately, so did a lot of other people,
so his time is very limited.

objects.name: text_intro_4
objects.string:
He only has time to play a few mini-games with you,
and each mini-game will only last a few seconds.

objects.name: text_intro_5
objects.string:
He also doesn't have time to explain any of it to you,
but figuring it out is half the fun!
